seo: WordPress, 插件, Rocklobster Contact Form 7, 任意文件上传漏洞, CVE-2020-35489
seo_en: WordPress, plugin, Rocklobster Contact Form 7, arbitrary file upload vulnerability, CVE-2020-35489
summary: 检测WordPress插件Rocklobster Contact Form 7版本低于5.3.2的任意文件上传漏洞，攻击者可利用此漏洞绕过文件类型限制上传任意文件。
summary_en: Detect the arbitrary file upload vulnerability in WordPress plugin Rocklobster Contact Form 7 with versions lower than 5.3.2. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to bypass file type restrictions and upload any file.
